mapper.select: SELECT PJ.AC_KEY AS AC_KEY , PJ.PJ_KEY AS PJ_KEY , PJ.AC_DIRECTOR_KEY AS AC_DIRECTOR_KEY , PJ.PJ_NM AS PJ_NM , PJ.PJ_START_DT AS PJ_START_DT , PJ.PJ_END_DT AS PJ_END_DT , PJ.PJ_SALE_EMP_KEY AS PJ_SALE_EMP_KEY , PJ.PJ_SUPPORT_EMP_KEY AS PJ_SUPPORT_EMP_KEY , PJ.REMARK AS REMARK , PJ.PJ_INSPECT_DT AS PJ_INSPECT_DT , PJ.FINISH_REMARK AS FINISH_REMARK , PJ.DELETE_YN AS DELETE_YN , PJ.REG_DT AS REG_DT , PJ.REG_TM AS REG_TM , PJ.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , PJ.SP_KEY AS SP_KEY , PJ.PJ_STATUS_CD AS PJ_STATUS_CD , AC.AC_NM AS AC_NM , DRT.AC_DIRECTOR_NM AS AC_DIRECTOR_NM , DRT.AC_DIRECTOR_MB_NUM AS AC_DIRECTOR_MB_NUM , DRT.AC_DIRECTOR_EMAIL AS AC_DIRECTOR_EMAIL , DRT.AC_DIRECTOR_POSITION_NM AS AC_DIRECTOR_POSITION_NM , (SELECT AC_DIRECTOR_NM FROM CMM_ACCOUNT_DIRECTOR_TB WHERE AC_DIRECTOR_KEY = PJ.AC_DIRECTOR_KEY) AS AC_DIRETOR_NM , EM.EMP_NM AS PJ_SALE_EMP_NM , EMS.EMP_NM AS PJ_SUPPORT_EMP_NM FROM PJ_MAIN_TB PJ JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB AC ON PJ.AC_KEY = AC.AC_KEY JOIN CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB EM ON PJ.PJ_SALE_EMP_KEY = EM.EMP_KEY JOIN CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB EMS ON PJ.PJ_SUPPORT_EMP_KEY = EMS.EMP_KEY LEFT JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_DIRECTOR_TB DRT ON PJ.AC_DIRECTOR_KEY = DRT.AC_DIRECTOR_KEY WHERE PJ.PJ_KEY=#{pjKey}
SELECT EMP_KEY , EMP_NM , EMP_MB_NUM FROM CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB

SELECT PBT.BD_KEY AS BD_KEY , PBT.PJ_KEY AS PJ_KEY , PBT.BD_LIMIT_DT AS BD_LIMIT_DT /* 입찰 기한 일자 */ , PBT.BD_LIMIT_TM AS BD_LIMIT_TM /* 임찰 기한 시간 */ , PBT.BD_PROPOSAL_YN AS BD_PROPOSAL_YN /* 입찰 제안서 여부 */ , PBT.BD_PROPOSAL_DUE_DT AS BD_PROPOSAL_DUE_DT /* 입찰 제안서 마감 일자 */ , PBT.BD_PROPOSAL_DUE_TM AS BD_PROPOSAL_DUE_TM /* 입찰 제안서 마감 시간 */ , PBT.BD_PROPOSAL_PRESENT_YN AS BD_PROPOSAL_PRESENT_YN /* 입찰 제안서 발표 여부 */ , PBT.BD_PROPOSAL_PRESENT_DT AS BD_PROPOSAL_PRESENT_DT /* 입찰 제안서 발표 일자 */ , PBT.BD_PROPOSAL_PRESENT_TM AS BD_PROPOSAL_PRESENT_TM /* 입찰 제안서 발표 시간 */ , PBT.BD_GB_YN AS BD_GB_YN /* 입찰 보증증권 여부 */ , PBT.REG_DT AS REG_DT , PBT.REG_TM AS REG_TM , PBT.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , PBT.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT , PBT.MOD_TM AS MOD_TM , PBT.MOD_EMP_KEY AS MOD_EMP_KEY , PBT.BD_GB_START_DT AS BD_GB_START_DT /* 입찰 보증증권 보증 시작일 */ , PBT.BD_GB_END_DT AS BD_GB_END_DT /* 입찰 보증증권 보증 종료일 */ , PBT.BD_GB_BD_AMOUNT AS BD_GB_BD_AMOUNT /* 입찰 보증증권 입찰금액 */ , PBT.BD_GB_DAY AS BD_GB_DAY /* 입찰일로부터 보증 몇 일 보증 기간 */ , PBT.BD_GB_RATE AS BD_GB_RATE /* 입찰 보증증권 요율 */ , PBT.BD_GB_FINISH_DT AS BD_GB_FINISH_DT /* 입찰 보증증권 발행일 */ , PBT.BD_GB_AMOUNT AS BD_GB_AMOUNT /* 입찰 보증증권 금액 */ , PBT.BD_GB_FINISH_YN AS BD_GB_FINISH_YN /* 입찰 보증증권 상태 N:발행전, R:발행요청, Y:발행완료 */
FROM PJ_BIDDING_TB PBT WHERE PBT.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND PBT.PJ_KEY = #{pjKey}

/* 입찰 서류 정보 목록 조회 */ SELECT PBF.BD_KEY AS BD_KEY , PBF.BD_SEQ AS BD_SEQ , PBF.BD_FILE_KIND_CD AS BD_FILE_KIND_CD , PBF.BD_DOC_CNT AS BD_DOC_CNT , CCM.CD_NM AS BD_FILE_DOC_NM , PBF.BD_FILE_DOC_NM AS BD_FILE_DOC_NM_ETC FROM PJ_BIDDING_FILE_INFO_TB PBF JOIN CMM_CODE_MNG_TB CCM ON PBF.BD_FILE_KIND_CD = CCM.CD_KEY WHERE PBF.BD_KEY = #{bdKey}

SELECT PMT.PJ_NM AS PJ_NM , PMT.AC_KEY AS AC_KEY , CAT.AC_NM AS AC_NM , PBT.BD_KEY AS BD_KEY , PBT.BD_LIMIT_DT AS BD_LIMIT_DT , PBT.BD_GB_BD_AMOUNT AS BD_GB_BD_AMOUNT , PBT.BD_GB_RATE AS BD_GB_RATE , PBT.BD_GB_DAY AS BD_GB_DAY , PBT.BD_GB_FINISH_DT AS BD_GB_FINISH_DT , PBT.BD_GB_AMOUNT AS BD_GB_AMOUNT , PBT.BD_GB_FINISH_YN AS BD_GB_FINISH_YN FROM PJ_MAIN_TB PMT JOIN PJ_BIDDING_TB PBT ON PMT.PJ_KEY = PBT.PJ_KEY AND PBT.DELETE_YN = 'N' JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CAT ON PMT.AC_KEY = CAT.AC_KEY WHERE PMT.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND PMT.PJ_KEY = #{pjKey}

/* 사용안함 - 입찰보증증권 정보 조회 */ SELECT GB_KEY AS GB_KEY , CT_KEY AS CT_KEY , GB_KIND_CD AS GB_KIND_CD , GB_FC_CLASS AS GB_FC_CLASS , GB_FC_PJ_KEY AS GB_FC_PJ_KEY , GB_START_DT AS GB_START_DT , GB_END_DT AS GB_END_DT , GB_ISSUE_YN AS GB_ISSUE_YN , GB_AMOUNT AS GB_AMOUNT , SALES_KEY AS SALES_KEY FROM CMM_GUARANTY_BOND_TB CGB WHERE GB_KIND_CD = 'GRBN1110' AND GB_FC_CLASS = 'P' AND GB_FC_PJ_KEY = #{pjKey}

SELECT PCT.CT_KEY AS CT_KEY , PCT.PJ_KEY AS PJ_KEY , PCT.CT_AMOUNT AS CT_AMOUNT , PCT.CT_DT AS CT_DT , PCT.CT_PAY_TERMS AS CT_PAY_TERMS
, PCT.COLLECT_TURN AS COLLECT_TURN , PCT.REG_DT AS REG_DT , PCT.REG_TM AS REG_TM , PCT.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , PCT.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT , PCT.MOD_TM AS MOD_TM , PCT.MOD_EMP_KEY AS MOD_EMP_KEY FROM PJ_CONTRACT_TB PCT WHERE PCT.PJ_KEY = #{pjKey} AND PCT.DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT POT.PJ_ORDER_KEY AS PJ_ORDER_KEY /* 프로젝트 발주 관리키 */ , POT.ORDER_CT_FK_KEY AS ORDER_CT_FK_KEY /* 프로젝트 관리키 */ , POT.ORDER_DT AS ORDER_DT /* 발주 일자 */ , POT.ORDER_AC_KEY AS ORDER_AC_KEY /* 사업자 번호 */ , CAT.AC_NM AS ORDER_AC_NM /* 발주처명 */ , POT.ORDER_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY AS ORDER_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY /* 발주 거래처 담당자 관리키 */ , CAD.AC_DIRECTOR_NM AS ORDER_AC_DIRECTOR_NM /* 발주 거래처 담당자 명 */ , POT.ORDER_PAY_TERMS AS ORDER_PAY_TERMS /* 발주 결제 조건 */ , POT.ORDER_AMOUNT AS ORDER_AMOUNT /* 발주 총금액 */ /* 부가세 포함여부 */ , POT.BILL_MAPPING_NUM AS BILL_MAPPING_NUM /* 계산서 맵핑 횟수 */ , CET.EMP_NM AS ORDER_EMP_NM /* 발주자명 */ , (SELECT SUM(POP.ORDER_QUANTITY) FROM PJ_ORDER_PRODUCT_TB POP WHERE POP.PJ_ORDER_KEY = POT.PJ_ORDER_KEY AND POP.DELETE_YN='N') AS ORDER_PRODUCT_CNT /* 발주 품목 전체 수량 */ , POT.REG_DT AS REG_DT , POT.REG_TM AS REG_TM , POT.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , POT.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT , POT.MOD_TM AS MOD_TM , POT.MOD_EMP_KEY AS MOD_EMP_KEY FROM PJ_ORDER_TB POT JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CAT ON CAT.AC_KEY = POT.ORDER_AC_KEY JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_DIRECTOR_TB CAD ON CAD.AC_DIRECTOR_KEY = POT.ORDER_AC_DIRECTOR_KEY JOIN CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CET ON CET.EMP_KEY = POT.REG_EMP_KEY WHERE POT.ORDER_CT_FK_KEY = #{pjKey} AND POT.DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT POP.PJ_ORDER_KEY AS PJ_ORDER_KEY /* PJ_ORDER_TB */ , POP.ORDER_SEQ AS ORDER_SEQ /* 발주 순번 */ , POP.ORDER_PM_FK_KEY AS ORDER_PM_FK_KEY /* 발주 제품 FK 관리키 */ , PPM.PM_NM_CD AS PM_NM /* 발주 제품명 */ , POP.ORDER_QUANTITY AS ORDER_QUANTITY /* 발주 수량 */ , POP.ORDER_UPRICE AS ORDER_UPRICE /* 발주 단가 */ , POP.ORDER_TOTAL_AMOUNT AS ORDER_TOTAL_AMOUNT /* 발주 전체 금액 */ , POP.MT_RATE AS MT_RATE /* 유지보수 비율 */ , POP.ORDER_KIND AS ORDER_KIND /* 매입 구분(H/W, S/W, 서비스) */
, POP.REMARK AS REMARK /* 비고 */ , POP.ORDER_RECEIPT_DT AS ORDER_RECEIPT_DT /* 발주 입고 일자 */ , POP.REG_DT AS REG_DT , POP.REG_TM AS REG_TM , POP.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , POP.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT , POP.MOD_TM AS MOD_TM , POP.MOD_EMP_KEY AS MOD_EMP_KEY FROM PJ_ORDER_PRODUCT_TB POP JOIN PM_PRODUCT_MNG_TB PPM ON PPM.PM_KEY = POP.ORDER_PM_FK_KEY
WHERE POP.PJ_ORDER_KEY = #{orderKey} AND POP.DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT PIB.PJ_KEY AS PJ_KEY /* PJ_MAIN_TB */ , PIB.INB_SEQ AS INB_SEQ , PIB.INB_PLACE AS INB_PLACE /* 설치구축 장소 */ , PIB.INB_CLASS AS INB_CLASS /* 설치구축 구분 */ , PIB.INB_PM_KEY AS INB_PM_KEY /* 설치구축 제품 관리키 */ , PPM.PM_NM_CD AS PM_NM /* 설치구축 제품명 */ , PIB.INB_PM_SERIAL_NO AS INB_PM_SERIAL_NO /* 설치구축 제품 시리얼 번호 */ , PIB.INB_DELIVERY_DT AS INB_DELIVERY_DT /* 설치구축 납품 일자 */ , PIB.INB_PM_VER AS INB_PM_VER /* 설치구축 제품 버전 */ , PIB.INB_SPEC_INFO AS INB_SPEC_INFO /* 설치구축 스펙 정보 */ , PIB.INB_CACHE_MEM AS INB_CACHE_MEM /* 설치구축 캐쉬 메모리 */ , PIB.INB_PORT_INFO AS INB_PORT_INFO /* 설치구축 포트 정보 */ , PIB.INB_MNG_IP AS INB_MNG_IP /* 설치구축 꽌리 아이피 */ , PIB.INB_PM_TYPE AS INB_PM_TYPE /* 설치구축 제품 유형 */ , PIB.REMARK AS REMARK /* 비고 */ , CET.EMP_NM AS INB_EMP_NM /* 설차구축 작업자명 */ , PIB.REG_DT AS REG_DT , PIB.REG_TM AS REG_TM , PIB.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , PIB.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT , PIB.MOD_TM AS MOD_TM , PIB.MOD_EMP_KEY AS MOD_EMP_KEY FROM PJ_INSTALL_AND_BUILD_TB PIB JOIN PM_PRODUCT_MNG_TB PPM ON PPM.PM_KEY = PIB.INB_PM_KEY JOIN CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CET ON CET.EMP_KEY = PIB.REG_EMP_KEY WHERE PIB.PJ_KEY = #{pjKey} AND PIB.DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT PWB.PJ_KEY AS PJ_KEY /* PJ_MAIN_TB */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_SEQ AS PJ_WORK_SEQ /* 프로젝트 작업 순번 */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_CLASS_CD AS PJ_WORK_CLASS_CD /* 프로젝트 작업 구분 */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_DT AS PJ_WORK_DT /* 프로젝트 작업 일자 */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_TAKE_TM AS PJ_WORK_TAKE_TM /* 시간(2)분(2) */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_NM AS PJ_WORK_NM /* 프로젝트 작업 명 */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_CONT AS PJ_WORK_CONT /* 프로젝트 작업 내용 */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_RESULT AS PJ_WORK_RESULT /* 프로젝트 작업 처리 결과 */ , PWB.REMARK AS REMARK /* 비고 */ , PWB.PJ_WORK_TM AS PJ_WORK_TM /* 프로젝트 작업 시간 */ , CET.EMP_NM AS PJ_WORK_EMP_NM /* 작업자명 */ , PWB.REG_DT AS REG_DT , PWB.REG_TM AS REG_TM , PWB.REG_EMP_KEY AS REG_EMP_KEY , PWB.MOD_DT AS MOD_DT , PWB.MOD_TM AS MOD_TM , PWB.MOD_EMP_KEY AS MOD_EMP_KEY FROM PJ_WORK_TB PWB JOIN CMM_EMPLOYEE_TB CET ON CET.EMP_KEY = PWB.REG_EMP_KEY WHERE PJ_KEY = #{pjKey} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT PSD.SALES_CT_FK_KEY AS PJ_KEY , PSD.SALES_KEY AS SALES_KEY , PCT.CT_KEY AS CT_KEY , PSD.SALES_TURN AS SALES_TURN /* 수금회차 */ , PSD.SALES_COLLECT_RATE AS SALES_COLLECT_RATE /* 수금비율 */ , PSD.SALES_TURN_AMOUNT AS SALES_TURN_AMOUNT /* 수금액 */ /* 부가세 포함여부 */ , PSD.SALES_STATUS_CD AS SALES_STATUS_CD /* 수금 진행 상태 */ , PSD.SALES_BILL_FC_DT AS SALES_BILL_FC_DT /* 계산서 예상일자 */ , PBO.BILL_ISSUE_DT AS BILL_ISSUE_DT /* 계산서 발행일자 */ , PSD.SALES_COLLECT_FC_DT AS SALES_COLLECT_FC_DT /* 수금 예상일자 */ , PSD.SALES_COLLECT_FINISH_DT AS SALES_COLLECT_FINISH_DT /* 수금 완료 일자 */ FROM PJ_SALES_DETAIL_TB PSD JOIN PJ_CONTRACT_TB PCT ON PSD.SALES_CT_FK_KEY = PCT.PJ_KEY AND PCT.DELETE_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN PJ_SD_BILLING_OP_TB PSO ON PSD.SALES_CT_FK_KEY = PSO.BILL_FK_PJ_KEY AND PSD.SALES_TURN = PSO.BILL_TURN_NO AND PSO.DELETE_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN PJ_SD_BILLING_TB PBO ON PSO.BILL_NO = PBO.BILL_NO AND PBO.DELETE_YN = 'N' WHERE PSD.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND PSD.SALES_CT_FK_KEY = #{pjKey}

SELECT PGB.GB_KEY AS GB_KEY , PGB.CT_KEY AS CT_KEY , PGB.SALES_KEY AS SALES_KEY , PGB.GB_KIND_CD AS GB_KIND_CD , PGB.GB_ISSUE_STATUS AS GB_ISSUE_STATUS , IFNULL(PGB.GB_PUBLISH_DT, '') AS GB_PUBLISH_DT , IFNULL(PGB.GB_AMOUNT, '-') AS GB_AMOUNT FROM PJ_GUARANTY_BOND_TB PGB WHERE PGB.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND PGB.CT_KEY = #{ctKey}

SELECT PGB.GB_KEY AS GB_KEY , PGB.CT_KEY AS CT_KEY , PGB.SALES_KEY AS SALES_KEY , PGB.GB_KIND_CD AS GB_KIND_CD , PCT.CT_AMOUNT AS CT_AMOUNT /* 계약금약 */ /* 부가세 포함 여부 */ /* 부가세 포함 전체 금액 */ , PMT.PJ_KEY AS PJ_KEY , PMT.PJ_NM AS PJ_NM /* 프로젝트 명 */ , PMT.PJ_START_DT AS PJ_START_DT /* 계약 시작일 */ , PMT.PJ_END_DT AS PJ_END_DT /* 계약 종료일 */ , PGB.GB_RATE AS GB_RATE /* 보증 요율 */ , PGB.GB_START_DT AS GB_START_DT /* 보증기간 시작일 */ , PGB.GB_END_DT AS GB_END_DT /* 보증기간 종료일 */ , PGB.GB_PUBLISH_DT AS GB_PUBLISH_DT /* 보증증권 발행일 */ , PGB.GB_AMOUNT AS GB_AMOUNT /* 보증증권 금액 */ , PGB.GB_CONTRACT_AMOUNT AS GB_CONTRACT_AMOUNT /*보증증권 계약 금액*/ /*, PGB.REMARK AS REMARK*/ /* 요청사항 */ , CAT1.AC_NM AS AC_NM /* 고객사명 */ , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CAT2.AC_NM SEPARATOR '
' ) AS SALES_AC_NM /* 매출처명 */ , PGB.GB_ISSUE_STATUS AS GB_ISSUE_STATUS , PGB.GB_INSPECT_DT AS GB_INSPECT_DT , PGB.GB_SK_AMOUNT AS GB_SK_AMOUNT , PGB.GB_REQ_DT AS GB_REQ_DT /* 제출 예정일 */ FROM PJ_GUARANTY_BOND_TB PGB LEFT OUTER JOIN PJ_CONTRACT_TB PCT ON PGB.CT_KEY = PCT.CT_KEY AND PCT.DELETE_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN PJ_MAIN_TB PMT ON PCT.PJ_KEY = PMT.PJ_KEY AND PMT.DELETE_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CAT1 ON PMT.AC_KEY = CAT1.AC_KEY LEFT OUTER JOIN PJ_SALES_DETAIL_TB PSD ON PSD.SALES_CT_FK_KEY = PMT.PJ_KEY AND PSD.DELETE_YN='N' LEFT OUTER JOIN CMM_ACCOUNT_TB CAT2 ON PSD.SALES_AC_KEY = CAT2.AC_KEY WHERE PGB.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND PGB.GB_KEY = #{gbKey}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CMM_PC_BILLING_TB CPB JOIN PJ_PURCHASE_TB PR ON CPB.BILL_CT_FK_KEY = PR.BUY_KEY JOIN PJ_ORDER_TB PO ON PO.PJ_ORDER_KEY = PR.BUY_ORDER_FK_KEY WHERE PO.PJ_ORDER_KEY = #{pjOrderKey} AND CPB.DELETE_YN = 'N';
